GameChanger | New York City | Full Time | ONSITE

We're an amateur sports platform that provides scorekeeping, live game streaming, stats and team management for baseball, softball and basketball teams. On a Saturday in March our users score more games on our platform that Major League Baseball does an entire season.

Stack is Python, Node, Go, Clojure, relying heavily on Docker for deployment. All in AWS. We recently open sourced Dusty, a project to deal with Docker based development environments: http://dusty.gc.com/

Tech Blog: http://tech.gc.com/

Looking for Senior and Lead Engineers. See more here: https://gc.com/about/careers Questions, interested, whatever: kristian@gc.com
